alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 4:41AM CDT until May 14 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Northeastern Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 440 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bonanza, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Greenwood... Barling... Pocola... Arkoma... Hackett... Bonanza... Cameron... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Jenny Lind... Rock Island... Central City... Scullyville... Witcherville... Braden... Mill Creek... Rye Hill... Jenson... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 10 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
